page.title: 03ANWICK VILLAGE
page.content: Anwick is a small village about 2.5 miles from Ruskington. It is a very nice village with lots of pleasant people . Anwick is not just a nice place to live ,but it's also unusual.It has a garage and a chicken factory that are owned by two brothers called Padleys.The chicken factory provides many shops with their produce.The village has also got a corner shop which sells about anything you require.There is also a small Post Office in the middle of the village.Anwick has got a garden centre which is quite profitable in the summer.There is also a social club that holds discos every now and again on a Saturday night.The old junior school has been converted into a meeting place for the Youth Training Scheme.
